channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MS
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MS

item.title: Report X-2023091020
item.description:
Report X-2023091020

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-23T15:12:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-20
  • City: OLIVE BRANCH
  • State: MS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The package was in the trailer on door 79.Content's cap was loose, causing internal leakage and damages to other packages. Absorbent pads were used to clean up spill. DescribePack: Content cap was not secured on bottle. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Absorbent pads was used and trailer fan was turned on to ventilate trailer.
